title: Virtual Conversation: Malangatana—Mozambique Modern
hero_caption: Malangatana Ngwenya. The Fountain of Blood (Fonte de sangue), 1961. The Cleveland Museum of Art, Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Lloyd H. Ellis Jr., 2012.67.
short_description: Please join us for a conversation with Hendrik Folkerts, Dittmer Curator, Modern and Contemporary Art; Constantine Petridis, Chair and Curator, Arts of Africa; and Felicia Mings, Academic Curator, Department of Academic Engagement and Research, co-organizers of the exhibition Malangatana: Mozambique Modern. This exhibition is supported in part through the Society for Contemporary Art's Activation Fund.
list_description: Presented by the Society for Contemporary Art
description:
Please join us for a conversation with Hendrik Folkerts, Dittmer Curator, Modern and Contemporary Art; Constantine Petridis, Chair and Curator, Arts of Africa; and Felicia Mings, Academic Curator, Department of Academic Engagement and Research, co-organizers of the exhibition Malangatana: Mozambique Modern. This exhibition is supported in part through the Society for Contemporary Art's Activation Fund.

Presented by the Society for Contemporary Art
